meta.title: eaves Woodland Hills | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: title

div.span: Value Living Welcome to eaves Woodland Hills, located in LA County, where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Woodland Hills apartments with a few little extras, like kitchens with full appliance packages and private patios and balconies. And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, Amazon package lockers, and more. Any way you look at it, our Woodland Hills apartments for rent offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Woodland Hills Apartments by eaves Many people choose to live away from Downtown Los Angeles in Woodland Hills, and no matter your reason to do so we feel you should have an apartment that offers you comfort and convenience. Thankfully, eaves Woodland Hills provides just that. We offer sensible studios and one- and two-bedroom floor plans in an LA County community flush with features and amenities you'll be wondering how you ever did without. From an on-site dry cleaning drop-off service to six lighted tennis courts and outdoor exercise stations, eaves Woodland Hills is the ideal community in the greater Los Angeles area. Woodland Hills Apartment Community Just north of the 101 Freeway between Encino, Calabasas and Canoga park, our Woodland Hills apartment community offers residents plenty to do by way of excellent nearby shopping, dining and entertainment venues. Whether you are looking for an outdoor excursion at Marvin Braude Mulholland Gateway Park or want to catch the game at Sport Connection Bar & Grill, we are near just what you need. For those days when you do not feel like cooking there are many options within walking distance, including Golden Garden Wok, Roys, Sharky's Mexican Grill and Fleming's, Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar. About Woodland Hills, CA A short drive from Hollywood and Santa Monica, Woodland Hills is situated in the southwestern area of the San Fernando Valley, east of Calabasas and west of Tarzana, with Warner Center in its northern section. Woodland Hills boasts world-class health care facilities, excellent educational institutions, and outstanding eateries. Culturally, the Concert in the Park series in Valley Cultural Center has been home to folk, jazz and pop concerts year-round for over 30 years.

div.h2: this is the real deal. this is eaves.

a.div: Understanding what you value goes beyond offering you a quality apartment. It means having a respectful, friendly staff that you know you can depend on when you need them. Giving you one less thing to worry about and one more way to feel at home in your new community. That’s eaves.
We know you value convenience. That’s why all of our locations are also carefully selected to put you within reach of local shopping, restaurants and public transportation.

You made a promise to yourself to live within your means. That doesn't mean living without. Take advantage of our special resident discounts, early deposit refund program, and longer lease term options.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Homes fully furnished and connected to give you the lifestyle you deserve. Flexible lease terms for the ultimate convenience.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Don’t worry, we’re best-friendly. See what we do to take pet-friendly living to the next level.

a.div: Our apartment homes were designed with you in mind. Learn more about the different finish packages we offer at our community.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, submit a service request, find policies and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

better than you expected.","description":"Value Living Welcome to eaves Woodland Hills, located in LA County, where sensible apartment living meets a sensible cost of living. We offer quality Woodland Hills apartments with a few little extras, like kitchens with full appliance packages and private patios and balconies. And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before. Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent. With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want to live, without all the hassle. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, Amazon package lockers, and more. Any way you look at it, our Woodland Hills apartments for rent offer more of what you hope for. Better than you bargained for. So, what are you waiting for? Woodland Hills Apartments by eaves Many people choose to live away from Downtown Los Angeles in Woodland Hills, and no matter your reason to do so we feel you should have an apartment that offers you comfort and convenience. Thankfully, eaves Woodland Hills provides just that. We offer sensible studios and one- and two-bedroom floor plans in an LA County community flush with features and amenities you'll be wondering how you ever did without. From an on-site dry cleaning drop-off service to six lighted tennis courts and outdoor exercise stations, eaves Woodland Hills is the ideal community in the greater Los Angeles area. Woodland Hills Apartment Community Just north of the 101 Freeway between Encino, Calabasas and Canoga park, our Woodland Hills apartment community offers residents plenty to do by way of excellent nearby shopping, dining and entertainment venues. Whether you are looking for an outdoor excursion at Marvin Braude Mulholland Gateway Park or want to catch the game at Sport Connection Bar & Grill, we are near just what you need. For those days when you do not feel like cooking there are many options within walking distance, including Golden Garden Wok, Roys, Sharky's Mexican Grill and Fleming's, Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar. About Woodland Hills, CA A short drive from Hollywood and Santa Monica, Woodland Hills is situated in the southwestern area of the San Fernando Valley, east of Calabasas and west of Tarzana, with Warner Center in its northern section. Woodland Hills boasts world-class health care facilities, excellent educational institutions, and outstanding eateries.
